alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 9:01PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and gusty winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with higher amounts in the Salt River Range. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 60 mph at times. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Through 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Travel in the backcountry is not advised.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Wind River Mountains West
